Class com.metratech.sdk.base.MTHTTPConnection

 
java.lang.Object
   |
   +----com.metratech.sdk.base.MTHTTPConnection

public class MTHTTPConnection
extends Object
implements MTMeterConnection

The MTHTTPConnection class wraps the java.net.HttpUrlConnection class to represent a connection to a metering sever using the HTTP protocol.

DEFAULT_HTTP_PORT

The default port for normal HTTP connections

DEFAULT_HTTPS_PORT

The default port for secure HTTP connections

DEFAULT_LISTENER

Description: The default metering server.

Construct the Connection.
